      • getFloatFromJson

        public static float getFloatFromJson(java.lang.String key,
                                     org.json.simple.JSONObject json,
                                     float defaultVal)
        "Robust" method for reading a float from a json.
        Parameters:
        key - The key in the json
        json - The json
        defaultVal - The default value to return when no value is found in the json.
        Returns:
        The value corresponding to the key, or the default value if the key is not found.
